item.title: ‘You’re not special’ graduation speech sparks buzz
item.description: http://t.co/eWLzJmtM via @YahooNews - I am so glad to hear this- passing on the proper message
item.content:encoded: http://t.co/eWLzJmtM via @YahooNews - I am so glad to hear this- passing on the proper message From the blog The Lookout: Social media was buzzing about a Boston-area high school teacher's blunt commencement speech that told students they "are not special." Wellesley High English teacher David McCullough Jr. told graduates "You are not special. You are not exceptional," quoting empirical evidence: "Across the country no fewer than 3.2 million seniors are graduating about now from more than [...] Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: news.yahoo.com

item.title: Obama: "The Private Sector Is Doing Fine" | RealClearPolitics
item.description: RT @CO2HOG: Obama: "The Private Sector Is Doing Fine" http://t.co/aWoOpOZn
item.content:encoded: RT @CO2HOG: Obama: "The Private Sector Is Doing Fine" http://t.co/aWoOpOZn Question: What about the Republicans saying that you're blaming the Europeans for the failures of your own policies? President Obama: The truth of the matter is that, as I said, we created 4.3 million jobs over the last 27 months, over 800,000 just this year alone. The private sector is doing fine. Where we're seeing weaknesses in our economy have to do with state and local government. Oftentimes cuts initiated by, you know, Governors or mayors who are not getting the kind of help that they have in the past from the federal government and who don't have the same kind of flexibility as the federal government in dealing with fewer revenues coming in. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: realclearpolitics.com

item.title: Big Brother’s all-seeing eye
item.description: http://t.co/DGhIOg1r Drones 'As Small As Golf Balls' Com... http://t.co/LjeP4E8I
item.content:encoded: http://t.co/DGhIOg1r Drones 'As Small As Golf Balls' Com... http://t.co/LjeP4E8I F or the past few weeks, I have been writing in this column about the government's use of drones and challenging their constitutionality on Fox News Channel, where I work. I once asked on air what Thomas Jefferson would have done if - had they existed at the time - King George III had sent drones to peer inside the bedroom windows of Monticello. I suspect Jefferson and his household would have trained their muskets on the drones and taken them down. I offer this historical anachronism as a hypothetical only, not as someone who is urging the use of violence against the government. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: washingtontimes.com

item.title: 今朝の西日本新聞の社会面の記事だが怒れ、自称オタクの同志。「オタク＝不審者」という完全な偏見に基づいて槍玉にあげられてる。教育の場では痴漢対策の教育も必要だろうがそれ以上に偏見で人を見ない教育は必要だと思うのだが？

item.title: Mite helps virus to wipe out bees
item.description: Mite helps virus to wipe out bees: A parasitic mite has helped spread a lethal virus that has wiped out millions... http://t.co/k7Gos35p
item.content:encoded: Mite helps virus to wipe out bees: A parasitic mite has helped spread a lethal virus that has wiped out millions... http://t.co/k7Gos35p A parasitic mite has helped spread a lethal virus that has wiped out millions of honeybee colonies worldwide, say scientists.
